Subject: Modify Rate Parameters
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=184860759
X-Yahoo-Profile: kvirgilm

 
 
I would like to be able to modify the rate parameters 'on the fly' within my 
code.  For example, I would like to be able to modify A, Ea, temperature 
exponent, and the concentration exponents.  I'd like to be able to do this so 
that I can determine the sensitivity of the reaction rate to these parameters.  
Is there an easy way to access these rate parameters directly in cantera?  
 
Thanks, 
 
Karl
